description: This file contains environment variable access helpers with fallbacks for a React frontend application. It provides functions to read environment variables safely, parse feature flags, and compile a configuration object.

methods.name: getEnv(key, defaultValue = undefined)
methods.description: Safely retrieves an environment variable with optional default and logs debug if env is missing or empty.

methods.name: getFeatureFlags()
methods.description: Parses feature flags from REACT_APP_FEATURE_FLAGS as JSON or comma-separated list.

methods.name: getConfig()
methods.description: Generates configuration for the app based on environment variables, including API base URL, WebSocket URL, frontend URL, node environment, and feature flags.
